means: [地名] [美国、纳米比亚] 康塞普申

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"思想，观点，观念"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: idea, concept, conception, thought, notion, impression
means: idea ： 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
concept ： 指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
conception ： 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
thought ： 指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
notion ： 指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
impression ： 指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。

word_mean: 妊娠，受孕，受精：妊娠的开始，以囊胚着床为标志

sentence.Network_en: Conception occurs when a single sperm fuses with an egg.
sentence.Network_cn: 当一个精子和一个卵子结合时受孕就发生了。

sentence.Network_en: The other fundamental consideration in the conception of a plan is function.
sentence.Network_cn: 在构思设计图时要考虑的另一个基本因素是功能。

sentence.Network_en: The plan was brilliant in its conception but failed because of lack of money.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管这计划构想绝妙，但终因资金不足而告流产。

spy英文关键词 - 佐欧伊的日志 - 网易博客 ... nature 先天 conception 受精 dominant 显性.

...计（communication design）以及设计概念（design concept）的竞赛，每年吸引了超过60个国家，1万件作品投稿参赛，得奖的作 …
新邦物流_百度百科 ... 五：企业精神 Enterprise Spirit 六：服务理念（Service concept） Service Concept 七：员工信守 Staff Slogan.
概念图( Concept Map) 是康乃尔大学的诺瓦克( J.D. Novak)思维导图的意义和应用  2009-1-8 18:18:51 阅读337 评论0 82009/01 Jan8.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin conceptio(n-), from the verb concipere (see conceive)

entry.def: A conception of something is an idea that you have of it in your mind.

example.ex: My conception of a garden was based on gardens I had visited in England...
example.tran: 我对花园的概念是基于我在英格兰观赏过的花园。

example.ex: I see him as someone with not the slightest conception of teamwork.
example.tran: 我认为他丝毫没有团队意识。

entry.def: Conception is the forming of an idea for something in your mind.

example.ex: The symphony is admirable in conception...
example.tran: 这支交响乐的构思好极了。

example.ex: The other fundamental consideration in the conception of a plan is function.
example.tran: 在构思设计图时要考虑的另一个基本因素是功能。

entry.def: Conception is the process in which the egg in a woman is fertilized and she becomes pregnant.

example.ex: Six weeks after conception your baby is the size of your little fingernail...
example.tran: 怀孕6个星期后，胎儿的大小相当于小拇指的指甲。

example.ex: Teenage conceptions have risen steadily in the last ten years.
example.tran: 过去10年中，少女怀孕的现象不断增多。

means.word_mean: 1. an abstract or general idea inferred or derived from specific instances
2. the act of becoming pregnant; fertilization of an ovum by a spermatozoon
3. the event that occurred at the beginning of something;

sentences.sentence: "from its creation the plan was doomed to failure"

means.word_mean: 4. the creation of something in the mind

auth_sentence.content: That's not my conception of a Higher Power.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's not my conception of a Higher Power.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's not my conception of a Higher Power.

auth_sentence.content: So the thousand days between conception and age two.
auth_sentence.res_content: So the thousand days between conception and age two.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So the thousand days between conception and age two.

auth_sentence.content: A conception...in a drawing will be...wrong realised as stone.
auth_sentence.res_content: A conception...in a drawing will be...wrong realised as stone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A conception...in a drawing will be...wrong realised as stone.

means.word_mean: 思想, 观念, 概念

sentences.en: He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship.
sentences.cn: 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。

sentences.en: The conception of the book took five minutes, but writing it took a year.
sentences.cn: 构想那本书只花了五分钟, 而写那本书却用了一年。

jushi.english: A good novelist needs great power of conception.
jushi.chinese: 出色的小说家需要有丰富的想象力。

jushi.english: He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship.
jushi.chinese: 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。

jushi.english: The conception of the book took five minutes, but writing it took a year.
jushi.chinese: 构想那本书只花了五分钟,而写那书却用了一年。
